Section.Catchline: Obligation to notify issuer of lost, destroyed, or wrongfully taken security certificate.

SectionBody.Text: If a security certificate has been lost, apparently destroyed, or wrongfully taken, and the owner fails to notify the issuer of that fact within a reasonable time after the owner has notice of it and the issuer registers a transfer of the security before receiving notification, the owner may not assert against the issuer a claim for registering the transfer under s. 678.4041 or a claim to a new security certificate under s. 678.4051.
